publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3032 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Keep Scotland Beautiful—That the Parliament welcomes the latest campaign by Keep Scotland Beautiful which, through adverts on the rear of buses, reminds motorists not to throw litter out of their vehicles and regrets that roadside litter, in addition to despoiling the countryside, costs the Scottish taxpayer £1 million a year in collection.
S2M-3032 Keep Scotland Beautiful (lodged on 27 June 2005) Margaret Smith*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-3032 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Keep Scotland Beautiful—That the Parliament welcomes the latest campaign by Keep Scotland Beautiful which, through adverts on the rear of buses, reminds motorists not to throw litter out of their vehicles and regrets that roadside litter, in addition to despoiling the countryside, costs the Scottish taxpayer £1 million a year in collection. Supported by: Margaret Smith, Mike Pringle, Donald Gorrie
S2M-3032 Keep Scotland Beautiful (lodged on 27 June 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3032 Keep Scotland Beautiful (lodged on 27 June 2005) Ms Sandra White*
